title: The Unfinished Dance
creator_credit: Henry Koster, Joe Pasternak and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Aspirational young ballet dancer refuses to let anything or anyone get in her way to becoming a prima ballerina. Cast includes Margaret O’Brien, Cyd Charisse, Karin Booth, Esther Dale, Thurston hall, harry hayden, Danny Thomas.
